data.title: Neil Patrick Harris has a secret wedding in Italy
data.meta_description: Today it’s all about happy news – we have lots of reasons to celebrate; a Royal Baby, a Saturday’s Baby, and now we have a surprise celebrity wedding.  Neil Patrick Harris married David Burtka this weekend in Italy. The couple, who are parents to twins Gi
data.text:
Today it's all happy news - we have lots of reasons to celebrate; a Royal Baby, a Saturday's Baby, and now we have a surprise celebrity wedding.

Neil Patrick Harris married David Burtka this weekend in Italy. The couple, who are parents to twins Gideon and Harper (aged 3), have been together for over 10 years.

The 41-year-old How I Met Your Mother star tied the knot with his actor/chef beau David Burtka - and get this, Elton John performed at the reception! You know you've made it when Elton John is your wedding singer.

Neil revealed the news via Twitter, telling his fans: "Guess what? @DavidBurtka and I got married over the weekend. In Italy. Yup, we put the 'n' and 'd' in 'husband'"

Both grooms wore custom Tom Ford tuxedos.

The couple announced their engagement via Twitter in June 2011 after passage of the Marriage Equality Act in New York. Harris then revealed that they actually got engaged five years earlier, but decided to keep the news a secret.

Congrats! Now we just want to find out more.
